name: Shroud of Unspoken Names
tooltip:
Shroud of Unspoken NamesLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Regal Drape, 2 Amber Idols, 5 Ivory Scarabs and 5 Bronze Scarabs to Keyl Swiftclaw in Silithus.  You must also obtain Revered reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Regal Drape
- Amber Idol x 2
- Bronze Scarab x 5
- Ivory Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
